name: Center for Computer Networks and Cyber Security
description: Focused on advancing research in computer networks, cybersecurity, and information security technologies.

name: Centre for Heterogeneous and Intelligent Processing Systems
description: Research center dedicated to heterogeneous computing, AI acceleration, and intelligent processing systems.

name: Quantum and Nano Devices Lab
description: Advanced research in quantum computing, nanotechnology, and quantum device development.

name: Centre of Data Modelling, Analytics and Visualization
description: Specializes in big data analytics, data visualization, and predictive modeling techniques.

name: Centre for Research in Space Science and Technology
description: Research center focused on space technology, satellite systems, and aerospace engineering.

name: Centre for Robotics, Automation & Intelligent Systems
description: Advanced research in robotics, automation technologies, and intelligent autonomous systems.

name: Centre for Cloud Computing & Big Data
description: Research and development in cloud computing architectures, distributed systems, and big data processing.

name: Crucible of Research and Innovation
description: Interdisciplinary research center fostering innovation across multiple engineering domains.

name: Center of Excellence in Information Security, Forensics, and Cyber Resilience
description: Specialized center for information security, digital forensics, and cyber resilience research.

name: Center of Excellence in Internet of Things
description: Research and development center focused on IoT technologies, smart systems, and connected devices.

name: Center for Pattern Recognition
description: Advanced research in pattern recognition, computer vision, and machine learning algorithms.

name: Knowledge Analytics & Ontological Engineering
description: Research center specializing in knowledge graphs, semantic web technologies, and ontological engineering.

name: Centre for Intelligent Systems
description: Research center focused on artificial intelligence, intelligent systems, and cognitive computing.

name: Laboratory of Photonics & Quantum Technology
description: Advanced research laboratory for photonics, quantum optics, and quantum communication technologies.

name: Center for Data Sciences and Applied Machine Learning
description: Research center dedicated to data science applications, machine learning, and AI-driven solutions.

name: Centre of Cognitive Computing and Computational Intelligence
description: Research center focusing on cognitive computing, computational intelligence, and brain-inspired computing.

name: IOT Maker's Space
description: Hands-on maker space for IoT prototyping, hardware development, and innovation projects.
